bs-checklist-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of checklist extension
bs-checklist-tag-checklist-desc:
Text for renders a checkbox or select field. Available configuration attributes:
{{Related|Bs-tag-desc}}
bs-checklist-tag-checklist-param-type: Text for type: list renders a select list. "type" has to be lowercase
bs-checklist-tag-checklist-param-list: Text for list: Name of the template with the available values. Parameter type must be set to list. "list" has to be lowercase
bs-checklist-tag-checklist-param-value: Text for value: checked or a value out of the list template. "value" has to be lowercase
